verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the Lord <S%H3050><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; praise <S%H1984><s%> him <S%H5650><s%>, O you servants of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
You that stand <S%H5975><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, in the courts <S%H2691><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>,
Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord <S%H3050><s%>; for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%>: sing praises <S%H2167><s%> unto his name <S%H8034><s%>; for it is pleasant <S%H5273><s%>.
For the Lord <S%H3050><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> unto himself <S%H3478><s%>, and Israel for his peculiar treasure <S%H5459><s%>.
For I know <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%>, and that our Lord <S%H113><s%> is above all gods <S%H430><s%>.
Whatever the Lord <S%H3068><s%> pleased <S%H2654><s%>, that did <S%H6213><s%> he in heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and in earth <S%H776><s%>, in the seas <S%H3220><s%>, and all deep places <S%H8415><s%>.

He causes the vapors <S%H5387><s%> to ascend <S%H5927><s%> from the ends <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; he makes <S%H6213><s%> lightnings <S%H1300><s%> for the rain <S%H4306><s%>; he brings <S%H3318><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%> out of his treasuries <S%H214><s%>.
Who struck <S%H5221><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, both of man <S%H120><s%> and animal <S%H929><s%>.
Who sent <S%H7971><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> and wonders <S%H4159><s%> into the middle <S%H8432><s%> of you <S%H4714><s%>, O Egypt, upon Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and upon all his servants <S%H5650><s%>.
Who struck <S%H5221><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%>, and killed <S%H2026><s%> mighty <S%H6099><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%>;
Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, and all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>:
And gave <S%H5414><s%> their land <S%H776><s%> for a heritage <S%H5159><s%>, a heritage <S%H5159><s%> unto Israel <S%H3478><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>.
Your name <S%H8034><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, endures for ever <S%H5769><s%>; and your memorial <S%H2143><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, throughout all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.
For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will judge <S%H1777><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>, and he will repent <S%H5162><s%> himself concerning his servants <S%H5650><s%>.
The idols <S%H6091><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%> are silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>'s hands <S%H3027><s%>.
They have mouths <S%H6310><s%>, but they speak <S%H1696><s%> not <S%H5869><s%>; eyes have they <S%H7200><s%>, but they see not;
They have ears <S%H241><s%>, but they hear <S%H238><s%> not <S%H3426><s%>; neither is there any breath <S%H7307><s%> in their mouths <S%H6310><s%>.
They that make <S%H6213><s%> them are like unto them <S%H982><s%>: so is every one that trusts in them.
Bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>:
Bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>: you that fear <S%H3373><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord <S%H3068><s%> out of Zion <S%H6726><s%>, which dwells <S%H7931><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the Lord <S%H3050><s%>.
